posts.text:
Núna koma specs um nokkra bíla sem voru kyntir á IAA Motor Show í Frankfurt alls ekki fyrir löngu

Þetta kemur í 3 pörtum:
Enjoy

2004 Aston Martin DB9:
Specs:
Configuration: All Alloy V12
Valvetrain: 4 Valves per Cyl
Displacement: 5953 cc / 363.3 cu in
Power: 302.0 kw / 450 bhp @ 6000 rpm
HP / Liter: 75.59 bhp per litre 
Top Speed: 300 kph / 186.4 mph
0 - 60 mph: 4.7 seconds
0 - 100 mph: 10.8 seconds
Drive Wheels: RWD w/LSD and Traction Control 
Pics and More Here

2003 Toyota CS&S Concept:
Specs:
Position: Front Electric, Rear Petrol
Configuration: Hybrid, Electric & Petrol Engines
Displacement: 1500 cc / 91.5 cu in
Drive Wheels: 4WD
Pics and More Here

2003 Volkswagen Concept R:
Specs:
Configuration: V6
Displacement: 3189 cc / 194.6 cu in
Power: 195 kw / 261.5 bhp @ 6250 rpm
Top Speed: 268.8 kph / 167.0 mph
0 - 60 mph: 5.2 seconds
Drive Wheels: RWD
